info.description:
Messing w/ R. Nijoff's nice pathtracer shadertoy. Hold down mouse button to see single fr quality (1 sample). 
Wanted better performance on my macmini (15fps@1080p) and higher visual acuity at expense of shutter speed. 
Jittering to reduce sample noise.
